00040 #include "pixmapstr.h"

00043 typedef struct _dmxPixPriv {
00044     Pixmap   pixmap;
00045     XImage  *detachedImage;
00046 } dmxPixPrivRec, *dmxPixPrivPtr;

00052                                  int width, int height, int depth,
